title: How Cannibalism Became a Top Issue in Brazil’s Election
description: An old claim by Brazil’s president that he would “eat an Indian” took mudslinging to a new level.
dc:creator: Simon Romero
media:credit: Mauricio Lima for The New York Times
media:description: Jair Bolsonaro, then a congressman, and his son, Flávio, who filmed an interview in 2016 in which Mr. Bolsonaro said he would “eat an Indian.”
